heading: Generate your perfect press release with AI
subheading: Get your custom press release options delivered straight to your inbox in minutes!. Just fill out the form below

featuresItems.text1: We use advanced artificial intelligence technologies and our expertise to create texts that meets your specific needs!.
featuresItems.text2: Typically it takes 1-2 days to craft a press release with the help of a copy writer and editor. However, our service streamlines the process and produces a press release for you in mere minutes, eliminating the need for professional personnel.
featuresItems.text3: Using AI to generate the press release can be leveraged as an advantage when presenting it to your boss. Also it can be as stand alone story.

name: Your Name
topicsub: The main topic of the press release
companies: Companies to be mentioned in the press release
people: People to be mentioned in the press release
generateLanguage: The language in which the press release should be generated
subscribeSubHead: Get your custom press release options delivered straight to your inbox in minutes!. Just fill out the form below
